dict.acceptation: 保持，保养；供养，抚养；生活，生计；饲料；牧草；

sent.orig: The verbs "keep" and'see" are irregular in their inflections.
sent.trans: "keep"与'see" 这两个动词的词形变化是不规则的。

sent.orig: They could only keep carrying on the scar, keep moving around, keep being everlasting in dizziness.
sent.trans: 只能继续背负著伤疤，继续游走，继续永无止境的晕眩。

sent.orig: Keep going, keep climbing, keep the effort and soon you'll find yourself reaching the top.
sent.trans: 继续前行，继续攀登，继续付出努力，很快你就会发现你已经登顶。

sent.orig: Then keep it brief, keep it honest and keep it moving.
sent.trans: 保持简洁，诚实，让面试能够进行下去。

sent.orig: I used to be able to keep two assistants, but now I only keep one.
sent.trans: 我过去还有能力雇用两个伙计，但是现在只雇一个。
